projects.title: Netflix-GPT
projects.description: A responsive Movie Streaming web app was developed using React and Firebase, ensuring adaptability across various devices. User authentication was implemented for personalized experiences. The TMDB API integration provides real-time access to movie data. Redux was utilized for efficient state management, and OpenAI API was incorporated for movie search suggestions. The app was globally deployed using Firebase Hosting, showcasing proficiency in JavaScript, React, Firebase, Redux, and API integration.

projects.title: Cozastore
projects.description: Cozastore is a e-commerce website which consist of user side and admin side where user side have all the basic features like Signin/Singup, cart, payment method, address otp varification and admin side have dashboard, add product, delivery status, coupon features etc

projects.title: SOCIAL MEDIA
projects.description: A scalable MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) application was architected to optimize performance and scalability. Key features include user authentication and dynamic theming (light/dark mode) for enhanced user experience. Social functionalities such as post creation, liking, and friend addition were integrated to foster community interaction. MongoDB was utilized for efficient data storage and management, ensuring reliability and flexibility. Responsive UI/UX was achieved using React.js, while backend logic and API integrations were handled with Node.js/Express.js.
